name: 7th International Conference on Advanced Research in Management, Business and Finance
content: What is ICMBF? The 7th International Conference on Advanced Research in Management, Business and Finance is a leading academic event that this year will take place on 19 â€“ 21 April 2024 in the breathtaking city of Athens, Greece. Why should you join ICMBF? Because this is a unique opportunity to network with the leading minds from around the world, receive feedback on your research, share your findings, and meet fellow academics. How can you join Management, Business, and Finance conferences 2024 (ICMBF)? There are so many ways to contribute. Join as an oral or a virtual presenter, submit your poster, get published in prestigious academic journals, or register as a regular participant.
